headline: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Expands Collaboration With Lumen And Lear For AI-Driven Transformation
summary: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) has recently made headlines with its strategic collaborations, notably partnering with Lumen Technologies and expanding its alliance with Lear Corporation. These initiatives aim to enhance business operations using advanced AI technologies. Over the last quarter, PLTR experienced a 29% price increase, likely bolstered by these influential partnerships. Despite the broader tech market seeing a modest rise, driven by favorable developments like potential Fed rate...

headline: Palantir Deepens Industry Ties As Lear And Lumen Embrace Its AI Platforms
summary: Palantir Technologies (NYSE:PLTR) is strengthening its role in the U.S. industry by expanding key partnerships and scheduling its next central customer showcase. The company announced a five-year extension with Lear Corp. (NYSE:LEA), a new collaboration with Lumen Technologies (NYSE:LUMN), and plans for its upcoming AIPCon 8 event in September 2025. headline: The Nuclear Company Co-founder & CEO Jonathan Webb to Keynote Palantir AIPCon
summary: COLUMBIA, S.C., September 04, 2025--The Nuclear Company, which is leading gigawatt-scale deployment of nuclear power across America and pioneering the modernization of nuclear construction, announces Co-founder & CEO Jonathan Webb will keynote today’s Palantir AIPCon 8, offering an early demo of NOS, the first AI-driven software system configured exclusively for nuclear construction. headline: High Growth Tech Stocks in the US for September 2025
summary: As of September 2025, the U.S. stock market has seen a boost from major tech stocks, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq climbing higher despite uncertainties surrounding trade policies and potential Federal Reserve rate cuts. In this environment, identifying high growth tech stocks involves looking at companies that not only capitalize on technological advancements but also demonstrate resilience amid fluctuating economic indicators and regulatory shifts.

headline: Palantir and Lumen Technologies Join Forces to Accelerate AI-Driven Telecom Transformation
summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR), a leading provider of enterprise operating systems, and Lumen Technologies (NYSE: LUMN), the trusted network for AI, today announced a collaboration that brings Palantir’s Foundry and Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP) to Lumen as it transforms its business.

raw.headline: Palantir and Lumen Technologies Join Forces to Accelerate AI-Driven Telecom Transformation
raw.summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR), a leading provider of enterprise operating systems, and Lumen Technologies (NYSE: LUMN), the trusted network for AI, today announced a collaboration that brings Palantir’s Foundry and Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP) to Lumen as it transforms its business.

headline: A New Set of Palantir Customers Takes the Spotlight at AIPCon 8
summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR) announced today that it will host its eighth AIPCon on Thursday, September 4th, 2025, with exclusive content available for online viewers starting 20 minutes before the start of the livestream.

raw.headline: A New Set of Palantir Customers Takes the Spotlight at AIPCon 8
raw.summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR) announced today that it will host its eighth AIPCon on Thursday, September 4th, 2025, with exclusive content available for online viewers starting 20 minutes before the start of the livestream.

headline: Palantir and Lear Announce Five-Year Partnership Expansion to Accelerate Automotive Technology Transformation
summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR), a leading provider of AI software, today announced a five-year expansion of its partnership with Lear Corporation (NYSE: LEA), a global automotive leader in Seating and E-Systems. Under the new agreement, Lear will broaden its use of Palantir Foundry, as well as Palantir’s Warp Speed manufacturing operating system and Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP), across its global manufacturing footprint.

raw.headline: Palantir and Lear Announce Five-Year Partnership Expansion to Accelerate Automotive Technology Transformation
raw.summary: DENVER, September 04, 2025--Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR), a leading provider of AI software, today announced a five-year expansion of its partnership with Lear Corporation (NYSE: LEA), a global automotive leader in Seating and E-Systems. Under the new agreement, Lear will broaden its use of Palantir Foundry, as well as Palantir’s Warp Speed manufacturing operating system and Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP), across its global manufacturing footprint.
